TEXT.Text: Union of Spirit
Give me Wave Stabilizer.
Lucky not to be late.
1 minute left. Before it gets too late, we need to equip Wave Stabilizer onto Dimension Stabilizer.
What are you doing? The dimension has been collapsed.
10 seconds left. 9…8…7…
Repair Dimension Stabilizer
Find Wave Stabilizer
Dimension Stabilizer cannot stand anymore.
Is it Wave Stabilizer? Please give it to me now.

Since Dimension Stabilizer still stands, dimension collaspe hasn't happened yet.%% But we don't know how long it can last. Wave Stabilizer should be found quickly.%% Wave Stabilizer was stolen by Jojo brothers in [Metro City Pier].
Two dimensions will collapse if it goes like this.
Dimension Stabilizer will soon reach limitation.
Defeat Jonathan
Defeat Joseph
Wave Stabilizer
Welcome to Metro City.
You…? Did you pass through the Sinkhole?

Can you help me please?%% This is {C=0xFFFF0000/}Portable Dimension Stabilizer{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. If you equip this, you would find it more stable to move around in this world.%% Also, {C=0xFFFF0000/}without Metro City Entrance Ticket{C=0xFF4D0D08/}you won't

You are from a world called Dragonica? Hmm..interesting. I'm Dr. Nicola and this is Metro City. %% I've been conducting my study about dimension shifting.%% The machine next to me makes dimension passage.%% For some reasons, right after opening dimension
Please move away if you have nothing to talk about. This world might disappear.
What are you curious about?
Talk to Nicola
Jojo's peculiar jailbreak
Jojo Brothers have escaped from Alkam Prison.
How would Jojo brothers escape from Alkam Prison?
Alkam Prison is famous for strict security but Jojo Brothers has escaped from it and came to [Metro City Port].%% I can't fall asleep because I'm worried about them coming to attack my laboratory.
Jojo Brothers might not just stop from stealing components, they might destroy the laboratory.
What's the sound outside? Is it…Jojo brothers?
Defeat Jonathan
Defeat Joseph
A war against crime and violence
Jojo Brothers and his subordinates are troubles.
Thanks to %name% the power of Metro City gangs has been weaker. Thank you.
Although Jojo Brothers were captured, the subordinates are still out there.%% We don't have power to stop them due to lack of police officers in Metro City.%% I hope %name% can help us out.
If it stays this way, this laboratory will also be taken over by them.
Are you looking for the entrance for [Metro City Port]?
Defeat Gang members
How do I close…Sinkhole?
(beep..beep….)Start Sinkhole extinction system. (beep…)Check energy capacity. Error occurred.
Energy charge completed. Operate Sinkhole extinction system.
Energy capacity is insufficient to maintain system. Please recharge energy.%% Lack of energy.%% System is downed. Switch to maintenance mode.
Stop operation when energy is all used. Sinkhole maintenance system is downed.%% Expected situation. Danger of dimension collapse due to Sinkhole extension.
Current energy capacity 3%. Possible to continue maintain mode for 30minutes. Starting count down.
Titanium Ore
Where is next…destination?
hmm…Sinkhole..Is there a way to get rid of it?
(crack..scratchy…)Error, Error. Danger, stoping operation.

Sinkhole is getting bigger.%% We don't know when it'll stop but there's rumor that it would cover whole area of Port of the Winds.%% There's no other way but to enter into Sinkhole and do investigation.%% %name% would take the mission?
It's a matter of existence of Port of the Winds. Is there any hero..?
A pedestrian was sucked into the Sinkhole. It's getting more serious.
Passing through Sinkhole
What hole? Sinkhole?
Villagers are feeling nervious nowdays.
A big dimension hole? Oh, no. It's in a jam!

Few days ago {C=0xFF00863C/}Sinkhole was appeared {C=0xFF4D0D08/}next to Advanced Archer <Lonnie>. %% We couldn't start investigation because we don't have any information.%% We kept villagers away but they are starting to worry about it.%% %name% can yo
Villagers are worried about it. Chaotic rumors are all around..
Please hurry up.
(…I feel being sucked into the hole. It seems like a passage through somewhere.)
Investigate Sinkhole
Nicola's Laboratory
